4.2
• Added support for more integer types
• Added viewing process properties in jdSystemMonitor
• Added some icons

4.1
• Added Portuguese (Brazil) translation (johnpetersa19)
• Unique connection names are now sorted at the end
• Fixed bugs

4.0
• Show process name and user in service list
• Connect to Accessibility Bus by default
• Added the ability the connect to the Bus of a running Flatpak
• Added Network Debugging

3.1
• Fix crash when monitor session lost connection

3.0
• Allow monitoring D-Bus messages
• Add support for object path type
• Some bug fixes

2.0
• Add support for more types
• Allow emitting a signal
• New Icon
• Add Dutch translation (Vistaus)

1.0
• First Release
